project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line Python tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. Users will be able to specify the input temperature and the desired output unit.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion function for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion function for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion function for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion function for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion function for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion function for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement user input handling to specify input temperature and desired output unit
Write tests for each of the conversion functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
